posts.post_content:
It was great to discard to [wild mongrel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=wild mongrel).  
  
It was also a part of those [sutured ghoul](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=sutured ghoul) decks that used [hermit druid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=hermit druid) to dump everything into the graveyard, and the ghoul got reanimated as a 70/70 flying trampler with haste. It was pretty painful to get killed by.
posts.html:
It was great to discard to wild mongrel.

It was also a part of those sutured ghoul decks that used hermit druid to dump everything into the graveyard, and the ghoul got reanimated as a 70/70 flying trampler with haste. It was pretty painful to get killed by.
